history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER transit directions
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER if in Atwood
TTS Okay, leaving from atwood st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER This evening.
TTS Okay, travelling at 02:24 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes, please.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 8 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 4 mins to Fifth avenue at Atwood Station. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER Could you repeat that first step, please?

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 8 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 4 mins to Fifth avenue at Atwood Station. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER I'm ready.
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER I'm finished.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the 28X to Pittsburgh International airport lower level. It will depart at 2:31pm. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER Okay, I'm finished.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No, thank you.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
